attributes.title: DOUBT THE DELUSION, NOT THE TRUTH! |20 JULY 2021|
attributes.description:
20 JULY 2021, TUESDAY (IST) - ENGLISH AND TAMIL NITHYANANDA SATSANG GIST
08:17 PM - THE SPH DARSHAN
SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM (SPH), JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM (JGM), HIS DIVINE HOLINESS (HDH) BHAGAWAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM.  
7TH DAY OF THE GURU PURNIMA BRAHMOTSAVAM 
08:46 PM - 10:35 PM - NITHYANANDA SATSANG AND POWERFUL INITIATION
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:
*PHYSICS OF THE CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY IS ALL ABOUT UNDERSTANDING THE WAY YOUR BODY EXISTS, UNDERSTANDING THE MECHANISM OF YOUR BODY.
*YOUR MIND IS THE SOFTWARE WHICH OPERATES THE MECHANISM OF YOUR BODY.
*IF YOU UNDERSTAND THE MECHANISM OF YOUR BODY, YOU CAN EVEN CONTROL THE MECHANISM BY YOURSELF WITHOUT THE NEED OF THE AUTOMATIC SOFTWARE WHICH CAN BE CONTROLLED BY SOMEONE ELSE, AND WHICH CAN BE USED EVEN TO SPY ON YOU.
*IF YOU ALLOW THE MIND TO CONTROL YOU, SOCIETY CAN CONTROL YOU, BECAUSE SOCIETY IS ALL ABOUT CONTROLLING THE MIND OF THE MASS.
*SO DON'T MAKE YOUR SOFTWARE AS INCHARGE OF YOUR LIFE. MAKE THE MECHANISM AS INCHARGE OF YOUR LIFE. BOTH ARE DIFFERENT.
*MECHANISM MEANS KNOWING THE INTIMATE CONNECTION OF HOW YOU FEEL WITH YOUR BODY AND HOW, BASED ON YOUR FEELING WITH YOUR BODY YOU RESPOND, ACT, REACT TO LIFE.
*FOR YOUR REACTION, SUCCESS, FOR YOU TO ACHIEVE WHAT YOU WANT IN YOUR LIFE FROM WEALTH TO POWERS, YOU DON'T NEED THE MIND. IF YOU JUST UNDERSTAND YOUR EXISTENCE PHYSICALLY AND YOUR INNER MECHANISM, THAT IS ENOUGH.
*YOU HAVE BEEN BRAINWASHED THAT YOUR MIND IS TOO IMPORTANT A COMPONENT OF YOU BY SOCIETY SO THEY CAN CONTINUE TO EXPLOIT YOU.
*IT IS LIKE SELLING A SOFTWARE TO YOU AND ONCE IT BECOMES PART OF YOUR LIFE, YOU ARE ADDICTED AND BOUND ONCE FOR ALL.
*EVERY UPGRADATION THEY DO, YOU AUTOMATICALLY PAY FOR IT BECAUSE THAT SOFTWARE HAS BECOME PART OF YOUR LIFE; YOU CANNOT EXIST WITHOUT THOSE UPGRADED VERSIONS.
*SAME WAY, WHEN YOU START BELIEVING YOUR MIND IS REQUIRED FOR YOUR EXISTENCE AND EXPANSION, YOU ARE CAUGHT. 
*THE FUNDAMENTAL NEED FOR YOU IS BUDDHI ABOUT YOUR PHYSICAL EXISTENCE AND YUKTI - CLARITY - ABOUT YOUR INNER MECHANISM FUNCTIONING.
*I WILL GIVE YOU SOME OF THE REVELATIONS OF MY GURU ARUNAGIRI YOGISHWARA ON THE INNER MECHANISM OF THE COSMOS, THE MACROCOSM AND THE INNER MECHANISM OF THE MICROCOSM - BOTH:
*THE SOURCE AND CORE OF YOUR EXISTENCE IS PARAMASHIVA.
*DON'T FEEL BORED WHEN I REPEAT THIS. I WILL REPEAT THIS TILL YOU BECOME PARAMASHIVA OR TILL YOUR MIND GETS BORED AND LEAVES YOU ONCE FOR ALL!
*YOUR MIND SHOULD THINK, ‘O GOD! THIS FELLOW IS GOING TO HANG ON TO THIS NITHYANANDA WHO IS CONSTANTLY GOING TO REPEAT, ‘YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA’. BETTER I LEAVE THIS GUY AND GO TO SOMEONE ELSE…’! 
*YOUR MIND SHOULD GET TIRED OF YOU AND TERRORISED BY ME REPEATING THAT YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA AND BORED OF FIGHTING WITH YOU AND LEAVE YOU. TILL THEN I WILL REPEAT!
*FOR OBVIOUSLY DELUSIONAL REASONS, YOU WILL NOT ACCEPT YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA WHEN I SAY YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA. YOU WILL SAY, ‘I AM PARAMASHIVA, THEN I WANT BILLION DOLLARS TO APPEAR HERE. IF IT IS NOT APPEARING, I AM NOT PARAMASHIVA.’
*THIS DELUSORY APPLICATION OF A TRUTH JUST TO PROVE THE TRUTH IS NOT TRUTH IS CALLED DELUSION.
*YOU JUST WANT THE DRUG CALLED MIND WHICH YOU TOOK TO CONTINUE ITS IMPACT AND EFFECT ON YOU.
*SO YOU JUST WANT TO DISPROVE MY STATEMENT THAT YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA.
*EVEN IF BILLION DOLLAR APPEARS, YOU WILL SAY, ‘NOW I WANT ALL THIS TO MANIFEST. IT IS NOT HAPPENING? THEN I AM NOT PARAMASHIVA.’ IF THAT ALSO HAPPENS, YOU WILL HAVE SOMETHING ELSE.
*I WILL TELL YOU THE RIGHT MECHANISM.
*LISTEN TO THIS VERBALISATION VERY CLEARLY:
WHEN I SAY YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA, THE FEELING YOU HAVE ABOUT YOU - YOUR EXISTENCE - THIS IS PARAMASHIVA…. FIRST COGNISE THAT.
